title: Turnip Greens Stir Fry 👌😍 | Side dish | Lunch
content:
Side Dish: Turnip Greens Stir Fry Servings: 8 Duration: 15 mins Easy, healthy and more nutrition benefits available in turnip Greens. It's very simple to prepare and goes well with steamed rice/ Chapathi/ Roti I sprinkled it with homemade masala powder which suits to any leafy vegetables curry or shallow fried vegetables, added this to give more richness to my turnip dish and  make sure to protect nutrients from it.. ( try to not over cook leafy vegetables ) Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Turnip Greens - 1 Bunch
  •  White onion - chopped
  • Oil - 2 tb sp
For tempering:
  • Mustard seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1 tsp
  • Urad Dal - 1 tb sp
  • Bengal gram - 1 tsp
  • Curry leaves - 5
Masala powder:
  • Roasted split Bengal gram - 80 gms
  • Coriander seeds - 1 tb sp
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 tb sp
  • Sesame seeds - 1 tsp
  • Dry coconut powder / desiccated coconut - 2 tb sp
  • Curry leaves - 7
  • Tamarind extract - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Red chilly powder - 1 tsp
  • Red chilly flakes - 1 tb sp
Procedure: Masala Powder:
  • Dry roast coriander seeds, cumin seeds, garlic, curry leaves, tamarind in a skillet pan over medium heat
  • Saute & add sesame seeds, dry coconut powder and roasted split Bengal gram when they started turning into brown color
  • Roast them till golden brown and turn off heat
  • Transfer them in a plate & let them become cool
  • Add in mixer and blend till smooth powder
  • Keep it aside
Making Turnip Greens Stir Fry:
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add oil & tempering
  • Saute and add chopped onions
  • Saute 5 mins
  • Add chopped turnip leaves
  • Saute 5 mins and add blended powder
  • Mix well & cook 2 mins
  • Serve with hot rice and clarified ghee / Dal / Roti
  • Happy cooking 👩🏻‍🍳 enjoy your day 😊
Step by step process shown below with pictures:   Note:
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • If you couldn't make it, you can choose your own choice of leafy vegetables and follow the same process and masala powder
